text: This was the first edition of the tournament. Tommy Paul won the title after defeating Marcos Giron 6–3, 6–3 in the final. ==Seeds== All seeds receive a bye into the second round. ==Draw== ===Finals=== ===Top half=== ====Section 1==== ====Section 2==== ===Bottom half=== ====Section 3==== ====Section 4==== ==References== *Main Draw *Qualifying Draw Oracle Challenger Series - New Haven - Men's Singles
